Bishal Timsina

Pentester

Coventry University

I am passionate about cybersecurity and ethical hacking, with extensive hands-on experience in solving labs and challenges. I have a strong foundation in Computer Systems and Networks, having completed numerous labs, including HackTheBox, blue team labs, forensic labs, and cryptography labs, and actively participating in CTF challenges such as CryptoHacks and PicoCTF. While I lack real-world experience, my practical knowledge equips me to tackle real-world cybersecurity challenges effectively. I am highly motivated, detailoriented, and committed to continuous learning, aiming to apply my skills to contribute to the welfare of humanity through IT technologies.
